artist: Painter: After Filippo Lauri; Engraver: Giovanni Vitalba; Publisher: John Boydell
description: landscape withtwo women and a baby; seated under a tree beside a stream; holding flowers; another woman standing; holding tree branch with left hand and reaching with right hand; 2 other figures seated at left beyond stream
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

in plate in black below image: Filippo Lauri Pinxit   G. Vitalba Sculpsit/ SPRING/ From the Original Picture of the same Size painted by/ Filippo Lauri in the aCollection of this Grace/ the Duke of Devonshire/ Vol II No.1  John Boydell execud\'t 1766 (a coat of arms is in the center of the inscription) | 1-635
title: Summer
